parsed_action.reasoning: Run a simple price test while aligning with inventory levels: raise price 5% on the lowest-inventory item (HOME_GOODS) to protect margin and reduce stock-out risk, lower price 5% on the highest-inventory item (APPAREL) to increase sell-through, and keep ELECTRONICS unchanged as a control to gauge demand elasticity across categories.
